instructions: From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Scroll to 'PHONE' and tap Display & gestures . Tap Brightness level . If necessary, clear the Automatic brightness check box. Touch the screen and slide the Automatic brightness slider to adjust the settings.
From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Scroll to 'PHONE' and tap Display, gestures & buttons . Tap Sleep . Select the desired backlight setting.
From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Scroll to 'PHONE' and tap Display & gestures . Tap Screen timeout . Select the desired backlight setting.

Touch and hold a vacant spot on any Home screen. Select a panel to add the widget, shortcut, or application screen to. Tap the Search icon to find a specific item quickly. Select either option from the drop-down menu: Widgets Scroll to and tap the desired widget. Selected screen must have available space large enough to fit the widget. Shortcuts Tap the Shortcuts tab. Scroll to and tap the desired shortcut item

Touch and hold a vacant spot on any Home screen. Tap Add apps and widgets . Select a panel to add the widget, shortcut, or application screen to. Tap the Search icon to find a specific item quickly. Select either option from the drop-down menu: Widgets Scroll to and tap the desired widget. Selected screen must have available space large enough to fit the widget. Shortcuts Tap the Shortcuts tab. Scroll to and tap the desired shortcut item.

From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Tap Personalize . Tap Choose wallpaper . Select one of these options: HTC wallpapers Scroll to the desired wallpaper image. If desired, tap PREVIEW . Tap APPLY . Live wallpapers Scroll to the desired wallpaper image. If desired, tap PREVIEW . Tap APPLY . Gallery Navigate to and select the desired image. Touch the screen and slide the crop box to move it to the portion of the image you want. Touch the screen and slide any corner of the crop box to adjust the size. Tap DONE .
Scroll to the desired wallpaper image. If desired, tap PREVIEW . Tap APPLY .
Scroll to the desired wallpaper image. If desired, tap PREVIEW . Tap APPLY .

Navigate to and select the desired image. Touch the screen and slide the crop box to move it to the portion of the image you want. Touch the screen and slide any corner of the crop box to adjust the size. Tap DONE .

From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Tap Personalize . Tap Lock screen style . Touch the screen and slide left or right to select from available lock screen options. If necessary, tap SETTINGS to select a home or custom wallpaper. Tap APPLY .
From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Tap Personalize . Tap Lock screen wallpaper . Select a home or custom wallpaper. Tap APPLY .
